verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H8141"\w* \w remission|strong="H8059"\w*,

\w Which|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* celebrated \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w order|strong="H3027"\w*. \w He|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* owing \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* neighbour \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w cannot|strong="H3808"\w* \w demand|strong="H1697"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* again, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w year|strong="H8058"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w remission|strong="H8059"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w Of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H5237"\w* \w or|strong="H3027"\w* \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* thou mayst \w exact|strong="H5065"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w*: \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w countryman|strong="H0251"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* neighbour thou shalt \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w power|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* demand \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w again|strong="H1961"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* beggar \w among|strong="H5159"\w* \w you|strong="H0834"\w*: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w possession|strong="H3423"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H7535"\w* \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w ordained|strong="H6680"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* bless thee, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w promised|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thou shalt \w lend|strong="H5670"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w borrow|strong="H5670"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* man. Thou shalt \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* \w very|strong="H7227"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w dominion|strong="H4910"\w* \w over|strong="H4910"\w* thee.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* dwelleth within \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy \w city|strong="H8179"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee, \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* poverty: thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w harden|strong="H0553"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w close|strong="H3824"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*,

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w poor|strong="H4270"\w* man, thou shalt \w lend|strong="H5670"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* thou perceivest \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w need|strong="H4270"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w Beware|strong="H8104"\w* \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w perhaps|strong="H6435"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w wicked|strong="H1100"\w* \w thought|strong="H0559"\w* steal \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7651"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w remission|strong="H8059"\w* draweth nigh; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou \w turn|strong="H5414"\w* \w away|strong="H5973"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thy \w poor|strong="H0034"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, denying \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w lend|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* \w which|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* asketh: \w lest|strong="H6435"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w cry|strong="H7121"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w* unto thee.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*: \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* shalt thou \w do|strong="H4639"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* craftily \w in|strong="H0430"\w* relieving \w his|strong="H3605"\w* necessities: \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w times|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

There \w will|strong="H0776"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* wanting \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* thy habitation: \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* liveth \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w man|strong="H2670"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w Hebrew|strong="H5680"\w* \w woman|strong="H5680"\w* \w is|strong="H0251"\w* \w sold|strong="H4376"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* hath \w served|strong="H5647"\w* thee \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* thou shalt \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*:

\w And|strong="H7971"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou sendest \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*, thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* \w empty|strong="H7387"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3342"\w* shalt \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* way out \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* out \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy barnfloor, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w winepress|strong="H3342"\w*, wherewith \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee.

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou \w also|strong="H3068"\w* wast \w a|strong="H1961"\w* bondservant \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* thee free, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H0595"\w* \w now|strong="H1961"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee \w this|strong="H2088"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H3318"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* loveth thee, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* findeth \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w well|strong="H2895"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee:

Thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w awl|strong="H4836"\w*, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* bore \w through|strong="H3651"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w ear|strong="H0241"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w* \w of|strong="H5650"\w* thy house, \w and|strong="H5650"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w shall|strong="H5650"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w for|strong="H3651"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: thou shalt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H5650"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w manner|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thy womanservant \w also|strong="H0637"\w*.

Turn \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w away|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou makest \w them|strong="H0853"\w* tree: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w served|strong="H5647"\w* thee \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* according \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wages|strong="H7939"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* hireling: \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H0430"\w* \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w works|strong="H5647"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou dost.

\w Of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstlings|strong="H1060"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* come \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w herds|strong="H1241"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, thou shalt \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w whatsoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w male|strong="H2145"\w* sex. Thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w work|strong="H5647"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* firstling \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* bullock, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w shear|strong="H1494"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w firstlings|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* shalt thou \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w every|strong="H8141"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w choose|strong="H0977"\w*, thou \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* part disfigured \w or|strong="H0176"\w* feeble, \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

But thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H0398"\w* within \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* thy \w city|strong="H8179"\w*: \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w shall|strong="H2889"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w them|strong="H0398"\w* \w alike|strong="H3162"\w*, \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* roe \w and|strong="H0398"\w* \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w the|strong="H0398"\w* hart.

\w Only|strong="H7535"\w* thou shalt take heed \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w as|strong="H0776"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*.
